query: SELECT id, userId, date, duration, distance, avgSpeed, maxSpeed, scooterId, LENGTH(gpsPointsJson) as gpsJsonLen FROM ridingRecords WHERE duration > 3600 OR distance > 100000 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
